import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'] }) export class HeaderComponent implements OnInit{ isAuth: boolean = false; ngOnInit() { } }
